lead_paragraph: Odyssey House writes, “We have not seen such a collapse of families since the crack epidemic of the 1980s and 1990s.”
snippet: Odyssey House writes, “We have not seen such a collapse of families since the crack epidemic of the 1980s and 1990s.”...

headline.main: ‘The Drumbeat of Bad News’ on the Opioid Toll
